Chain Lightning is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Chain Lightning is a Lvl 6 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Chain Lightning Information

Description: Strike an enemy with lightning. Three more bolts will leap from the target, electrifying as many as three other enemies within 18m. On Save: Targets still take half damage. Level: Lvl 6 spell Scho
